summary: This script takes the contents of makeDatabase.py and makeGroupingDatabase.py, searches for "CREATE TABLE" statements using grep command, extracts table names after "TABLE", and saves them in simpleDeduction.txt.

details.comment: This script takes the contents of makeDatabase.py and makeGroupingDatabase.py, searches for "CREATE TABLE" statements using grep command, extracts table names after "TABLE", and saves them in simpleDeduction.txt.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
cat makeDatabase.py makeGroupingDatabase.py | grep -E -o "CREATE TABLE [^ ]+" | grep -E -o "[^ ]+$" > simpleDeduction.txt
